ðŸ“– Summary: Bandit is a security linter for Python code that identifies common security vulnerabilities. It works by processing Python files, building an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST), and running plugins against the AST nodes to detect potential issues. Bandit is also available as a container image, ensuring consistent and verifiable execution.
